member.name: CMSG_SP3_COMPATIBLE_AUX_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_SP3_COMPATIBLE_AUX_INFO structure contains information needed for SP3 compatible encryption.

member.name: CMSG_SP3_COMPATIBLE_AUX_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: CMSG_SP3_COMPATIBLE_AUX_INFO.dwFlags
member.summary: Setting CMSG_SP3_COMPATIBLE_ENCRYPT_FLAG enables SP3 compatible encryption. Zero salt instead of no salt and the encryption algorithm parameters are NULL instead of containing encoded RC2 parameters or encoded IV octet string. The encrypted symmetric key is encoded little-endian instead of big-endian form.
